name: Kenshi
description: A free-roaming squad based RPG. Focusing on open-ended sandbox gameplay features rather than a linear story. Be a trader, a thief, a rebel, a warlord, an adventurer, a farmer, a slave, or just food for the cannibals. Research new equipment and craft new gear.
minimum_requirements: OS:64-bit Windows Processor:Dual-core 64-bit Memory:6 GB RAM Graphics:Pixel shader 5.0 capable card DirectX®:11 Hard Drive:14GB HD space
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows 7 64-bit Processor:Quad-core 64-bit Memory:16 GB RAM DirectX®:11 Hard Drive:14GB HD space**Recommended install to SSD for optimum performance
